mean_en: a feeling that somebody has done something wrong, illegal or dishonest, even though you have no proof; the feeling that you cannot trust somebody/something
sentence: The two men raised the suspicion of the policeman.
sentence_trans: 这两人引起了警察的怀疑。
word_etyma: su=sus下面 + spic环顾，检查 + ion表名词 → 在下面看 → 怀疑
